DOC.brief_summary: This data collection Registry is a multi-center, observational outcomes Database designed to collect data on the demographics, presentation, diagnosis, treatment, resource use, quality of life and outcomes of subjects utilizing Caris Molecular Intelligence™ Services for treatment of solid tumor cancer.
DOC.criteria: Age greater than or equal to 18 years, and Solid Tumor analyzed by Caris Molecular Intelligence™ Service Profile(s) and/or Caris NextGeneration Sequencing Individual test orders; defined as single biomarker assessment Due to the complexity of state and federal requirements governing the participation of prisoners in research, prisonerpatients shall not be approached for participation in the Registry.
